dct_description_sm: This TIF data layer represents hillshade for Portland Metro, Oregon in 1997. The dataset was originally published by the Metro Data Resource Center in February 2001.[This is a graphic image to be used to create shaded relief. It was created using ARC/INFO Grid and the USGS contour data. The drainage enforcement method was used to assure that the hillshading would properly register to the streams.]
